name: 3-hydroxybutanoic acid-3-hydroxypentanoic acid, copolymer
SMLTrestrictions: G35 Group Restriction No. 35 corresponds to FCM substance No. 467,744,1059. Group restriction specification is expressed as crotonic acid.
Restrictions: The substance is used as product obtained by bacterial fermentation. In compliance with the specifications mentioned in the Table 4 of Annex I.
